name: kine-instruction-sync
description: Synchronize centralized GitHub Copilot instructions from remote URLs or local files based on language configuration

instructionSync.remoteConfigUrl.description: URL to a remote JSON configuration file containing instruction sources. When set, sources are fetched from this URL instead of (or in addition to) local settings. The remote file should contain a JSON object with a 'sources' array matching the instructionSync.sources schema.

instructionSync.remoteConfigCacheDuratio.description: How long (in seconds) to cache the remote configuration before re-fetching. Set to 0 to always fetch fresh. Default: 3600 (1 hour).

instructionSync.sources.description: List of instruction sources with language and URL mappings

language.description: The programming language this source applies to (e.g., 'C#', 'AL', 'TypeScript')

url.description: The URL to fetch the instructions from

destinationFolder.description: The folder where the instructions file will be created (relative to workspace root)

destinationFile.description: The name of the instructions file

instructionSync.syncOnOpen.description: Automatically sync instructions when a workspace is opened

instructionSync.syncOnConfigChange.description: Automatically sync instructions when the configuration changes

instructionSync.confirmBeforeSync.description: Show confirmation dialog before overwriting local instructions

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
